title: Mannenna Vepenna Song Lyrics Enakku Vaaitha Adimaigal
stanzas:
Mannenna Vepenna Song Lyrics From #EnakkuVaaithaAdimaigal
#friendshipfailuresong #EVATrollsong

Naatla irukkalaam
vootula irukkalaam
aayiram friendu
ivan adangaatha friendu
ivan ayogiya friendu
ivan anaagareega friendu
ivan araajaga friendu
ivan aanava friendu
moththathula oru
alpamaana friendu

mannenna vaeppenna
velakkenna ivan
ekkaedu kettaathaan
enakkenna..

darrraana daarraaana
damukkunnu
ivan kodumpaavi
bommaya koluthunnu

oora suththum maadu
ivan onnaa number fraudu
un nenja nakka vandhaa
nee nikkaamalae odu

thalaya thalaya aattuvaan
filimathaane kaattuvaan
pinju poana tyre vachu
peelaa vandiya oattuvaan

kaiyyaa odachi
kaala odachi
avan moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
kuththa poren daa

kaiyyaa odachi
kaala odachi
moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
thoala urichi
dolaak thatchi
kuththa poren daa

mannenna vaeppenna
velakkenna ivan
ekkaedu kettaathaan
enakkenna..

darrraana daarraaana
damukkunnu
ivan kodumpaavi
bommaya koluthunnu

ivan manushan illa maanikkam
solra vaayi konikkum
adi surakkuyanikkum
thirundha maattaan ennikkum

ponnungannaa pesuvaane
pozhudhu varikkum
ivan poga maattaan
police-thaan varra varaikkum

torture-rathaan koduppaane
enga future-a paperaa
kilippaane.

thoal koduppaan tholane
ivan pazhatha mattum
thinnuputtu thola
mattum koduppaan

kaiyyaa odachi
kaala odachi
avan moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
kuththa poren daa

moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
thoala urichi
dolaak thatchi
kuththa poren daa

mannenna vaeppenna
velakkenna ivan
ekkaedu kettaathaan
enakkenna..

naan aasappattene
avastha pattnene
auto bomba akkula
vachi allal pattene

naanga railu pettiye
engala kalati vittiye
friendchip-ula petrol
ooothi koluthi vittiye

kaakkaa mutta kanna kaatti
thonga vutta tholaya vutta
palavaatti

un mutham onnum
venaam poadi.
raththatha tharuvaan
nanban thaandi

kaiyyaa odachi
kaala odachi
ava moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
kuththa poren daa

kaiyyaa odachi
kaala odachi
moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
thoala urichi
dolaak thatchi
kuththa poren daa

adangappaa idhu
ulaga nadippuda saami

machi edhukkuda
unakkindha vilambaram
un friendshippe
venaampa kelamburom

pudhushpudhsa poiyya
solli potlam kattuven
andha aattu thola
mela pottu ivala vettuven

kaiyyaa odachi
kaala odachi
ava moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
kuththa poren daa

kaiyyaa odachi

moonja odachi
vaaya odachi
thoala urichi
dolaak thatchi
kuththa poren daa

saagumpodhu kooda
aduthavanukku tholla
kodukkaama saagave
maattaanugadaa....
